hash

span

public static final Layout span
pascal string allows 0-255 tokens. todo: should length==0 have a special meaning? if so what meaning?

padding4

public static final Layout padding4
block alignment

offset

public static final Layout offset
The position of the key in its text file up to 4 gigs from start of ByteBuffer.

Key files can be larger than 4 gigs, but the segment of that file being indexed or mmap'd uses only 32 bits address space with nio.
